title: Gold nanorod-based smart platform for efficient cellular uptake and combination therapy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27385-27393
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06051B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kibeom Kim, Mamta Ramgopal Chejara, Been Yoon, Myoung-Hwan Park
An amphiphilic polymer-coated GNR platform was studied for chemo- and photothermal combination therapy, promoting controlled drug release, and inducing cellular uptake by deforming the cell membrane under NIR light.
